adrFormatAddress: 387 Park Ave S 4th floor, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: I recently bought a home with Jonathan and I cannot say enough wonderful things about the experience.  Jonathan was extremely knowledgeable about the the real estate process which was helpful to us as this was an intimidating process. He had a wealth of information and familiarity with the areas we were looking in and helped guide us with our search. We always felt that Jonathan was looking out for our best interest and never felt like we were being “sold.”  He was able to refer us to an excellent mortgage banker with knowledge of the best financing options.  I will be forever grateful for all the Jonathan brought to the table with this experience.

text.text: I recently bought a home with Jonathan and I cannot say enough wonderful things about the experience.  Jonathan was extremely knowledgeable about the the real estate process which was helpful to us as this was an intimidating process. He had a wealth of information and familiarity with the areas we were looking in and helped guide us with our search. We always felt that Jonathan was looking out for our best interest and never felt like we were being “sold.”  He was able to refer us to an excellent mortgage banker with knowledge of the best financing options.  I will be forever grateful for all the Jonathan brought to the table with this experience.

originalText.text:
Jonathan Jossen is a seasoned professional who is gifted at quickly understanding what clients are looking for.  From the start, everything Jonathan showed us met our criteria. He educated us quickly on the Battery Park City market so we could make a competitive offer.

As you would expect from his background, Jonathan is very analytical. This was very helpful in evaluating comparative properties.

Jonathan is straightforward and demonstrates the highest integrity.

With his help, we got a great price for the condo of our dreams. I’ve recommended him to friends and plan to work with him in the future

originalText.text:
Jonathan is an incredible broker!! I cannot recommend him enough. He’s trustworthy, extremely knowledgeable and very dedicated. I would not have my apt without him and would only use him for my future real estate deals. He’s an expert in Battery Park and knows every building. It was a pleasure working with him!!
- Inna

originalText.text: As a real estate broker, Jonathan goes above and beyond, and lives by his word of “always being available.” He loves his job, works around the clock, and understands the value of building trustworthy relationships. I highly recommend him.

text.text: As a real estate broker, Jonathan goes above and beyond, and lives by his word of “always being available.” He loves his job, works around the clock, and understands the value of building trustworthy relationships. I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: It was just my my wife and I moving our family of 4 (young twin boys). Jonathan jumped in and helped us unpack and move that hot summer day. That sums up who Jonathan is and his commitment to his clients.
